events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position. Our team will review your qualifications and respond shortly.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering department for further evaluation by our technical recruitment team.
A recruiter specializing in software development roles has been assigned to guide you through the selection process.
Your initial screening interview has been completed. The feedback is promising and indicates alignment with our engineering standards.
Thank you for your prompt response confirming availability for the upcoming technical interview scheduled next week.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 2 PM UTC with one of our senior engineers.
The technical interview has been completed successfully. The interviewers praised your problem-solving skills and coding proficiency.
We have arranged an HR interview for you on May 13th at 10 AM UTC to discuss company culture, benefits, and next steps.
Your HR interview was completed with positive feedback regarding your attitude and alignment with our organizational values.
We are pleased to offer you the position of Software Engineer. Please review the offer details sent to your email and respond at your earliest convenience.
Thank you for accepting the offer. We are excited to welcome you to our engineering team and will begin onboarding preparations immediately.
Your onboarding process has officially started. Please complete the necessary paperwork and training modules to get started smoothly.
Congratulations and welcome aboard! The hiring process is now closed. We look forward to your contributions as a key member of our engineering team.
